name: John Wick: The Game (Pompasaur)
description:
THE TOONS HAVE KILLED John Wick™ DOG!!! AVENGE UR DOG!!

Download the incredible game and do not delete it from your hard drive EVER or I will KNOW

Made in a game jam with Lunatunny of Lunatunny fame... here is the game he made it actually is good LOL 

 "I'm not scared of any shit. Do not make me scared." -John Wick
